There are a lot of people in need out there, and at DAF, we are determined to reach as many as possible and You together we can donate for people in need.

Check Now

Make Donation

Each cent counts, it’s time to show kindness to people in need, and at DAF we get your donation over to the needy.

Join Now
About Us

We Are In A Mission To Impact People

DeleAjayi Foundation is a non-profit organization that was created to reach millions of people across West Africa and the United States of America. This charity organization was founded in 2020 out of love for humanity and to be able to impact the lives of people living in underserved communities, most especially the vulnerable population such as women and children. DeleAjayi Foundation has provided food, clothing, shelter and a network of support services to people of all ages and from all walks of life.

  • Support people in need
  • Provide food and clothing
  • Provide scholarships to students
  • Share love and hope to communities
0

Successfull Campaigns

Our Causes

Give Us Now

DAF is dedicated to causes that create an avenue for people in need, most especially in providing basic food, housing supplies and ensuring that school students are empowered through scholarships.

Scholarships

We are here to support the school students by providing tuition support to make the education journey easy and achievable.

Donate
Details

School Supplies

Over the years, DAF has provided school supplies to students to ease the burden on the parents and guardians. We are a platform to your needs.

Donate
Details

Food Supplies

We have dealt with hunger in many communities in the USA and West Africa by distributing foods to Churches, Mosques and individuals in need.

Donate
Details

Housing Support Services

DAF supported the needy in paying rents to provide shelter to them and their loved ones.

Donate
Details

Get Help

DAF is one channel to get help.

Donate

Our Funfact

You Have The Power Today To Change Tomorrow

Through giving, You and DAF can make tomorrow of someone blossom, bring hope to the lost, reunite the deserted homes by showing love and affection through giving scholarships, school supplies, food supplies and housing support services.
